it.essepuntato.earmark.core.test
Interface EARMARKTest

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTest, DocumentCreation, DocumentStructure, EqualityTest, FrancescoPoggiTestOne, LoadTest, ModifyingDocument, StoreTest
public interface EARMARKTest

This interface defines the common methods of any test belonging to the EARMARK test suite.

Author:
Silvio Peroni

Method Summary

Method Detail

doTest

java.util.List<java.lang.String> doTest()
Apply the test and returns a list of string explaining successes and failures of them.

Returns:
a list of string describing the test results.

getTestName

java.lang.String getTestName()
Get the name of the test.

Returns:
the name of the test.

passed

java.lang.String passed(java.lang.String msg)
A message that indicates the success of a test or of part of it.

Parameters:
msg - a short description of the test or of part of it.
Returns:
the short description given as input, labelled as "passed".

failed

java.lang.String failed(java.lang.String msg)
A message that indicates the failure of a test or of part of it.

Parameters:
msg - a short description of the test or of part of it.
Returns:
the short description given as input, labelled as "failed".

failed

java.lang.String failed(java.lang.String msg,
                        java.lang.String reason)
A message that indicates the failure of a test or of part of it.

Parameters:
msg - a short description of the test or of part of it.
reason - a short description of the possible reason of failure.
Returns:
the short description and the reason of failure given as input, labelled as "failed".

useDocument

boolean useDocument(EARMARKDocument document)
Specify an EARMARK document to be used in the test.

Parameters:
document - the document to be used in the test.
Returns:
true if the document will be actually used in the test, false otherwise.
